001package ltd.icecold.orangeengine.api.data.model;
002
003public enum AnimationType {
004    IDLE(1,"IDLE"),WALK(2,"WALK"),JUMP(3,"JUMP"),DEATH(4,"DEATH");
005    private int sign;
006    private String name;
007
008    AnimationType(int sign, String name) {
009        this.sign = sign;
010        this.name = name;
011    }
012
013    public int getSign() {
014        return sign;
015    }
016
017    public String getName() {
018        return name;
019    }
020
021    public AnimationType getBySign(Integer id){
022        for (AnimationType value : AnimationType.values()) {
023            if (value.sign == id){
024                return value;
025            }
026        }
027        return null;
028    }
029
030}
